common.footerQuestions: If you have any questions, please

verifyEmail.secondaryText: Thank you for signing up for Let's 0!. Please click the link below to verify your email and to set up your password.
verifyEmail.subject: Action Required: Confirm Your Email to Join Let's 0!

onboardEmail.secondaryText: Thank you for completing account setup! Congratulations on starting your journey with Let's 0!. We’re excited you’re here and can’t wait to help you get started.
onboardEmail.subject: Welcome Aboard! Access Let's 0! Platform Now

forgotPassword.principalText: We received a request to reset your password.
forgotPassword.secondaryText: Click the button below to set up a new password for your account. If you did not request to reset your password, ignore this email.
forgotPassword.subject: Action Required: Reset Your Password
